raw_response: {"answer_index": 3, "answer_text": "Both prolactin and growth hormone", "confidence": 8, "reasoning": "The hypothalamus exerts inhibitory control over prolactin via dopamine (prolactin-inhibiting hormone). Growth hormone is regulated by both stimulatory (GHRH) and inhibitory (somatostatin) hypothalamic hormones. Thus, both prolactin and growth hormone are under inhibitory influence from the hypothalamus.", "evidence_quality": "normal"}
